name: Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Information
notes: To request or identify a service, promotion, allowance, or charge; to specify the amount or percentage for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

elements.name: Allowance or Charge Indicator
elements.notes: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified

elements.name: Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

elements.name: Agency Qualifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

elements.name: Agency Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Code
elements.notes: Agency maintained code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

elements.name: Allowance/Charge Percent Qualifier
elements.notes: Code indicating on what basis allowance or charge percent is calculated

elements.name: Rate
elements.notes: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

elements.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
elements.notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

elements.name: Allowance or Charge Method of Handling Code
elements.notes: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge

elements.name: Reference Identification
elements.notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

elements.name: Option Number
elements.notes: A unique number identifying available promotion or allowance options when more than one is offered

elements.name: Description
elements.notes: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
